√dīp 'shine'

present: [4.] dī́pyate etc. AV.+  dī́pyati etc. E.+  

perfect: didīpe  

aorist: [1.] adīpi   -- [3.] adidīpat etc.  adīdipat etc.   -- [5.] adīpiṣṭa  

[future: dīpiṣyate  dīpitā  ]

verbal: dīpta U.+  

secondary: intensive: dedīpyate etc. E.+  dedīpyantīm   -- desiderative: didīpiṣa-   -- causative: dīpáyati etc. V.+  dīpáyate etc.  dīpyáte  

derivatives: dīpa  dīpaka E.+  dīpin C.  dīpana S.+  dī́pti B.+  dīpra C.  

Probably related with √2dī.
